product.title: DARKROCK D360 CPU Liquid Cooler with 360mm Radiator, Addressable RGB Lights, Pure Copper Pump, and AMD, AM5/ AM4, Intel LGA 1851/1700/1200 Brackets Ready - Black

protection_plans.title: Asurion Complete Protect: One plan covers all eligible past and future purchases (Renews Monthly Until Cancelled)

product.categories_flat: Industrial & Scientific > Electronics > Computers & Accessories > Computer Components > Internal Components > Fans & Cooling > Water Cooling Systems

brand_story.description: DARKROCK is a computer hardware brand from the United States, mainly producing cases and CPU coolers.

faqs.title: How to describe our products?
faqs.body: DARKROCK's products only use the all-black concept, dedicated to creating a distinctive look, with ARGB fans and light bars to give consumers an extraordinary experience.

faqs.title: Whether our products are of high quality?
faqs.body: There is no doubt about it. we are committed to creating a product of superior quality. The tempered glass and iron plates keep the case from feeling plastic, and the dust filter configuration gives the case great cooling performance.

a_plus_content.company_description_text: DARKROCK is a computer hardware brand from the United States, mainly producing cases and CPU coolers. The original intention of DARKROCK product design is to serve game enthusiasts and people who have strict requirements on computer configuration.

feature_bullets: Copper Base: High-performance AIO Water Cooling Systems with a pure copper base pump head and high thermal conductivity for optimal CPU cooling

Better Cooling Performance: CPU Liquid Cooler with a full copper base, aluminum fin cold plate, and braided hose, which ensures quick and efficient heat dissipation, keeping your CPU running smoothly even during heavy usage
ARGB Lighting: Addressable RGB lights on both fan and water-cooling head, creating colorful and soft light effect for efficient cooling with rich lighting effects
PWM Smart Control: Adjustable PWM fans (800 RPM - 1800 RPM) , automatically adjusting the speed according to CPU temperature, providing strong airflow and low noise
Compatibility: Extensive compatibility with Intel (LGA1851/ 1700/ 1200/ 115X) and AMD (AM5/ AM4) brackets, making it a versatile option for a wide range of systems
product.feature_bullets_flat: Compatibility: Extensive compatibility with Intel (LGA1851/ 1700/ 1200/ 115X) and AMD (AM5/ AM4) brackets, making it a versatile option for a wide range of systems. PWM Smart Control: Adjustable PWM fans (800 RPM - 1800 RPM) , automatically adjusting the speed according to CPU temperature, providing strong airflow and low noise. ARGB Lighting: Addressable RGB lights on both fan and water-cooling head, creating colorful and soft light effect for efficient cooling with rich lighting effects. Better Cooling Performance: CPU Liquid Cooler with a full copper base, aluminum fin cold plate, and braided hose, which ensures quick and efficient heat dissipation, keeping your CPU running smoothly even during heavy usage. Copper Base: High-performance AIO Water Cooling Systems with a pure copper base pump head and high thermal conductivity for optimal CPU cooling.

top_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise, works pretty well
top_reviews.body: Nice price and overall nice performances. I was not sure about how reliable and easy to install this could be; but in the end it is running 24/7and cooling off pretty well my Ryzen 9.  It is quite silent overall and has a good amount of lights to set it up either so it can blind you or it can be quite subtle. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Nice price and overall nice performances. I was not sure about how reliable and easy to install this could be; but in the end it is running 24/7and cooling off pretty well my Ryzen 9.

It is quite silent overall and has a good amount of lights to set it up either so it can blind you or it can be quite subtle.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2025

top_reviews.title: Price to Performance Buy
top_reviews.body: I Used it with an I7 for about 4months and it has never let me get above 56 degrees C. Under heavy load. It is currently Now on an AMD RYZEN 5 and it hasn't gotten above 54 degrees C. Under heavy load. It was very easy to put together, instructions were very clear and concise. SO far, the quality is great. It works perfectly with top mount I don't need front mount. The look from factory is Bland even with the provided a RGB Fans, I have since Purchased a different set for it and they are great, if they came with it stock, I wouldn't have minded paying a little extra instead of 2 separate purchases. The Noise level of the fans is quiet and seemed to perform well, I was just not impressed with the RGB in them. So that does not effect my review thats jmo. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I Used it with an I7 for about 4months and it has never let me get above 56 degrees C. Under heavy load.
It is currently Now on an AMD RYZEN 5 and it hasn't gotten above 54 degrees C. Under heavy load.
It was very easy to put together, instructions were very clear and concise.
SO far, the quality is great. It works perfectly with top mount I don't need front mount.
The look from factory is Bland even with the provided a RGB Fans, I have since Purchased a different set for it and they are great, if they came with it stock, I wouldn't have minded paying a little extra instead of 2 separate purchases.
The Noise level of the fans is quiet and seemed to perform well, I was just not impressed with the RGB in them. So that does not effect my review thats jmo.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2025

top_reviews.title: Solid Unit
top_reviews.body: Unit is solid so far, I haven’t pushed it yet but the temps seem to be holding steady and a lot cooler than prior. One thing I will note is that the logo on the fans need to be facing the radiator to push the air out, I had them pulling the warm air into the case on my initial fire up after putting it together. Other than that the install is straight forward. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Unit is solid so far, I haven’t pushed it yet but the temps seem to be holding steady and a lot cooler than prior. One thing I will note is that the logo on the fans need to be facing the radiator to push the air out, I had them pulling the warm air into the case on my initial fire up after putting it together. date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2025

top_reviews.title: Great AIO
top_reviews.body: Have it on a 9700x @ 70f ambient temps. Idle windows11 temps are at 39c. Bop6 gaming temps hover right around 48c. The supplied thermal paste is a bit to be desired but does do the job. Love the stealth look on the cpu. I will not hesitate to buy from this company for any future builds. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Have it on a 9700x @ 70f ambient temps. Idle windows11 temps are at 39c. Bop6 gaming temps hover right around 48c. The supplied thermal paste is a bit to be desired but does do the job. Love the stealth look on the cpu. I will not hesitate to buy from this company for any future builds.
Read more
